subject: Football
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
Sex Crimes
Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: A central finding of the Penn State inquiry is that Joe Paterno knew as early as 1998 of concerns about Jerry Sandusky’s inappropriate behavior.
snippet: A central finding of the Penn State inquiry is that Joe Paterno knew as early as 1998 of concerns about Jerry Sandusky’s inappropriate behavior.
